description:
Toraji gives the Muroe High kendo club a vacation, since he has a business trip to schedule. Yuuji invites Tamaki to go to an amusement park that`s hosting a Blade Braver play. At the venue, She meets a girl called Rin Suzuki, a fan of Braver`s rival, Shinaider. They enter a quiz game show to win The Blade Bravers plush dolls. Unfortunately, Rin wins the plush dolls, in a tie-breaker round. However, Rin gives up all the plush dolls, except the Shinaider plush doll, to Tamaki.
Source: Wiki

titles.title: ブレイバーとシナイダー
